content.html: Not looking forward to when we've a country with two or three AI companies that serve different demographics and dispositions and they become the new dividing political line by feeding those groups the content and ideology that makes them feel good. Oh, wait...shit...
content.value:
Not looking forward to when we've a country with two or three AI companies that serve different demographics and dispositions and they become the new dividing political line by feeding those groups the content and ideology that makes them feel good.
